sn2.2:1.2: Standing to one side, the godling Kassapa spoke this verse in the Buddha’s presence:
sn2.2:2.1: “If a mendicant is a meditator, freed in mind,
sn2.2:2.2: and if they desire the heart’s fulfillment—
sn2.2:2.3: having known the arising and passing of the world,
sn2.2:2.4: good-hearted, independent, that is their reward.”
